definition[0]: to include something in a speech, piece of writing, activity etc
example[0]: He managed to work in a few references to his new book.
example[1]: Here are a few goodies you can work into your daily diet.
definition[1]: to add one substance to another and mix them together in a very thorough way
example[2]: Work the butter into the flour.
definition[2]: to arrange to meet someone, even though you are very busy
example[3]: My scheduleâ€™s pretty full, but I think I can work you in.
